social_notification.name: eventName
social_notification.description: The name of the event being notified about

social_notification.name: eventDates
social_notification.description: The dates when the event occurs

social_notification.name: watchPartyRideKit
social_notification.description: Any relevant kits or accessories for watch parties or rides related to the event

newsletter.name: Subject
newsletter.description: A concise summary of the newsletter content, intended to entice recipients to open.

newsletter.name: Body
newsletter.description: The main content of the newsletter, detailing news, products, promotions, etc.

newsletter.name: From
newsletter.description: Email address and name of the sender, often used for branding purposes.

newsletter.name: To
newsletter.description: Recipient's email address, determining who receives this newsletter.

newsletter.name: date
newsletter.description: Timestamp indicating when the newsletter was sent or created.

newsletter.name: ShopLink
newsletter.description: A direct link to relevant products or offers featured in the newsletter.

newsletter.name: discount_percentage
newsletter.description: Percentage discount offered on products or services mentioned in the newsletter.

newsletter.name: promotion_end_date
newsletter.description: Deadline for claiming offers or discounts mentioned in the newsletter.

newsletter.name: new_product
newsletter.description: Name of a new product introduced in the newsletter.

newsletter.name: CompanyName
newsletter.description: Name and legal details of the company sending the newsletter.

promotion.name: valid_from
promotion.description: The date and time when the promotion begins.

promotion.name: valid_to
promotion.description: The date and time when the promotion ends.

promotion.name: minimum_purchase
promotion.description: The minimum purchase amount required to qualify for the promotion.

promotion.name: discount_code
promotion.description: The unique code customers can use to apply the discount at checkout.

promotion.name: title
promotion.description: A brief, descriptive headline for the promotion.

promotion.name: merchandise
promotion.description: The specific merchandise or products that are on promotion.

promotion.name: order_qualification
promotion.description: Any special conditions that must be met to qualify for the promotion (e.g., purchasing a certain number of items).

promotion.name: focus
promotion.description: A brief description of what the promotion is highlighting or supporting.

promotion.name: checkout_link
promotion.description: The direct link customers can use to apply the discount during checkout.

promotion.name: valid_until
promotion.description: An alternative phrasing of when the promotion ends, often using more natural language.

personal.name: subject
personal.description: The main topic of the email.

personal.name: client
personal.description: The person or entity the email is about.

personal.name: lawyer
personal.description: The lawyer handling the case or matter.

personal.name: location
personal.description: The physical address related to the email's purpose.

personal.name: deadline
personal.description: Important dates or timelines mentioned in the email.

personal.name: post_text
personal.description: The main body of text in the email.

general.name: email
general.description: Email address associated with the recipient.

general.name: subject
general.description: Brief summary of what the email is about.

general.name: sender
general.description: Entity or individual sending the email.

general.name: changes_date
general.description: Date when changes referenced in the email will occur.

general.name: templates_for_energy_efficiency_work
general.description: Specific template(s) related to energy efficiency work mentioned in the email.

general.name: reward
general.description: Incentive or reward offered for performing an action, if applicable.

general.name: qualification
general.description: Any conditions or requirements that need to be met to receive a reward or participate in an offer.

general.name: opt_out_instructions
general.description: Instructions on how to opt out of receiving future emails from the sender.

billing.name: Subject
billing.description: Brief summary of the email content.

billing.name: PaymentMethod
billing.description: Allowed payment methods for the billing.

billing.name: accounts_due_date
billing.description: Date by which payment is due.

billing.name: ChargeableCalls
billing.description: Explanation of charges for certain calls or services.

billing.name: CompanyName
billing.description: The company name associated with the billing.

billing.name: CompanyNumber
billing.description: Unique identifier assigned to a company by its government.

billing.name: DirectorResponsibilitiesUrl
billing.description: URL providing information about directors' responsibilities.

billing.name: LateFilingPenaltiesUrl
billing.description: URL with details on penalties for late filing of accounts.

order_confirmation.name: order_id
order_confirmation.description: Unique identifier for the placed order.

order_confirmation.name: placed_on
order_confirmation.description: Timestamp when the order was placed by the customer.

order_confirmation.name: total_amount
order_confirmation.description: Total cost of the order, including taxes and discounts.

order_confirmation.name: invoice_id
order_confirmation.description: Unique identifier for the invoice associated with the order.

order_confirmation.name: due_date
order_confirmation.description: Date by which payment is expected for the order.

order_confirmation.name: ShipmentNumber
order_confirmation.description: Tracking number or identifier for the shipment of ordered items.

order_confirmation.name: EstimatedDeliveryTime
order_confirmation.description: Predicted time window for delivery of the shipped items.

order_confirmation.name: DeliveryMethod
order_confirmation.description: Description of how the order will be delivered, including any special instructions.

order_confirmation.name: payment_method
order_confirmation.description: Payment method used by the customer for the order and any associated charges.

other.name: subject
other.description: Brief summary of the email's content.

other.name: sender
other.description: Person or entity sending the email.

other.name: fca_number_bande_financial
other.description: Financial Conduct Authority number for B&E Financial.

other.name: opt_out_deadline
other.description: Deadline for recipients to opt out of the transfer.

other.name: business_name
other.description: Name of the business involved in the transfer.

other.name: fca_number
other.description: Financial Conduct Authority number associated with the business.

other.name: transition_date
other.description: Actual date when the transition took place.

other.name: bill_name
other.description: Name of the bill or legislation mentioned in the email.

shipping_update.name: DeliveryDate
shipping_update.description: The date when the package was delivered or is scheduled to be delivered.

shipping_update.name: SenderCompany
shipping_update.description: The company that sent the parcel.

shipping_update.name: DeliveredBy
shipping_update.description: The delivery service provider that handled the shipment.

shipping_update.name: ConsignmentNumber
shipping_update.description: A secondary identifier for the shipment used by the carrier.

shipping_update.name: PhoneNumberForQueries
shipping_update.description: Contact number for inquiries related to the shipment.

shipping_update.name: CompanyNameForQueries
shipping_update.description: The company name associated with the contact number for queries.

shipping_update.name: DeliveryTime
shipping_update.description: The time when the package was delivered or is scheduled to be delivered.

shipping_update.name: Sender
shipping_update.description: The entity that dispatched the parcel.

shipping_update.name: Subject
shipping_update.description: A brief summary of the email's content, often indicating the shipment status.
